mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_people (type, subtype, hostname, hostid, hostphone, number, lessee,stay, employee, expend,addtime,updatetime ) values (#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lessee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=DATETIME}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=DATETIME} )
mapper.update: update t_people set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtype = #{subtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hostname = #{hostname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hostid = #{hostid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hostphone = #{hostphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lessee = #{lessee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stay = #{stay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee = #{employee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expend = #{expend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=DATETIME} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
